lenders.name: Mia

Deep enough, and strong enough,

...
More, and more. And when all those people believe in you,
deep enough and strong enough believe in you, hard enough and long enough it stands to reason you, yourself will start to see what everybody sees in you.

Together the client and I set up a positive life direction for their professional activities.

lenders.name: FBC Microfinance Group
lenders.loan_because: In his first sermon, Jesus said: "The Spirit of the Lord is on me, because he has anointed me to preach good news to the poor.  He has sent me to proclaim freedom for the prisoners and recovery of sight for the blind, to release the oppressed, to proclaim the year of the Lord's favor."  (Luke 4:18-19) This message leads us to have compassion for the poor, not just in terms of charity, but to help them lift themselves up.  We strongly support Kiva's work in helping entrepreneurs in less-developed countries start, maintain and grow their businesses.
lenders.occupational_info: We are members of the First Baptist Church in the city of Washington DC.  Our church's mission is to love God and love one another.  All are welcome at our church.
